Package com.backbase.interview.course.service

Interface CourseService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CourseServiceImpl
    public interface CourseService
    Service interface that provides various methods to work on the HTTP request objects from REST calls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Object cancelUserFromCourse​(java.lang.Long courseId, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> jsonObject)
      Removes a participant from the course corresponding to the ID provided.
      java.lang.Object createCourse​(CourseEntity entity)
      Given a valid CourseEntity object a course is created in the database.
      java.util.Calendar getCalendarFromDate​(java.util.Date date)
      Returns a calendar object after trimming the hour, minute, seconds and milliseconds.
      java.lang.Object getCourseById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns a course corresponding to the ID provided.
      java.lang.Object getCourseByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      Returns a course corresponding to the title provided.
      java.lang.Object signUpForCourse​(java.lang.Long courseId, ParticipantEntity participantEntity)
      Assigns the participant to the course corresponding to the ID provided.

    • Method Detail

      • createCourse

        java.lang.Object createCourse​(CourseEntity entity)
        Given a valid CourseEntity object a course is created in the database.
        Parameters:
        entity - - CourseEntity object.
        Returns:
        CourseEntity object if a course is created successfully. Return error messages when course already exists or when invalid date is provided.

      • getCourseByTitle

        java.lang.Object getCourseByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
        Returns a course corresponding to the title provided.
        Parameters:
        title - - String object.
        Returns:
        CourseEntity object if a course having the specified title is available. Else return null.

      • getCourseById

        java.lang.Object getCourseById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Returns a course corresponding to the ID provided.
        Parameters:
        id - - Long object.
        Returns:
        CourseEntity object if a course having the specified id is available. Else return null.

      • signUpForCourse

        java.lang.Object signUpForCourse​(java.lang.Long courseId,
                                 ParticipantEntity participantEntity)
        Assigns the participant to the course corresponding to the ID provided.
        Parameters:
        courseId - - Long object.
        participantEntity - - ParticipantEntity object.
        Returns:
        CourseEntity object if a participant is created successfully under the course with the specified id. If the course with the specified id is not available or if the request body is invalid, return error message.

      • getCalendarFromDate

        java.util.Calendar getCalendarFromDate​(java.util.Date date)
        Returns a calendar object after trimming the hour, minute, seconds and milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        date - - Calendar Object
        Returns:
        Calendar object with hour, minute, seconds and milliseconds trimmed from date object.

      • cancelUserFromCourse

        java.lang.Object cancelUserFromCourse​(java.lang.Long courseId,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> jsonObject)
        Removes a participant from the course corresponding to the ID provided.
        Parameters:
        courseId - - Long object.
        jsonObject - - HashMap object.
        Returns:
        CourseEntity object if a participant is removed successfully from the course with the specified id. If the course with the specified id is not available or the request body is invalid, return error message.
